title: One Summer
description: Red and White Roses: UnityThe assignment: a fabulous coast-to-coast photo tour of the U.S.A. The problem: straight-shooting photojournalist Shade Colby didn't believe in unity—he always worked alone. The catch: if he wanted this job, he'd have to spend the summer with Bryan Mitchell, a sexy society photographer—who was as great a temptation as the assignment itself!
author: Nora Roberts
